subject: p16848073
History: Evaluation of the patient with anastomotic stricture after esophago gastroduodenoscopy with dilatation.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. Heart size and mediastinum appears stable. There is no definitive evidence of pneumomediastinum or pneumothorax. Lungs are essentially clear. Blunting of the right costophrenic angle is unchanged.
